docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-9 Albright Says U.S. Is Ready To Act Alone Against Iraq Secretary of State Madeleine K. Albright said the United States was ready to act alone if necessary to punish Iraq for its efforts to develop chemical and biological weapons. Though Ms. Albright reiterated the warning that President Clinton delivered on Tuesday, White House and Pentagon officials sought to stamp out expectations that a strike against Iraq was imminent or inevitable. A6
